r.s: Decode and Encode data in Bittorrent format
r.d: This package consists of three classes which handles the encoding and decoding of data in Bittorrent format. You can also extract useful informations from .torrent files, create .torrent files and query the torrent's scrape page to get its statistics. PHP5 only.
r.n: * Stable Release * Added File_Bittorrent2_MakeTorrent::addFiles() and File_Bittorrent2_MakeTorrent::setName() by barry hunter
